name: Hero's Display
text: With a dramatic flourish you display your weapons to the crowd. Onlookers are elated, and your enemies are demoralized.
prerequisites: Dazzling Display, Weapon Focus, and proficiency with the selected weapon.
benefit: When you spend a swift action to make a performance combat check, you present the weapon in which you have Weapon Focus in a triumphant display. You gain a +2 bonus on the performance combat check and make an Intimidate check to demoralize all foes within 30 feet who can see your display.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend up to 6 stamina points to increase the radius of the demoralizing effect by 5 feet per stamina point you spent (to a maximum of 60 feet).
text_zh: 当你向大众展示了自己对武器的精深娴熟之后，观众为之沸腾，对手则为之气沮。
prerequisites_zh: 炫目技巧，武器专攻，熟悉所选定的武器。
benefit_zh: 当你以迅捷动作进行演武检定时，你挥舞着拥有“武器专攻”专长的武器做出胜利宣告。你的演武检定+2，并能对30尺内能看到你表演的所有对手进行一次挫败士气的威吓检定。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗至多6点耐力来提升挫败士气效果的范围，每消耗一点耐力提升5尺半径（半径最大为60尺）。
